item.title: What is a Static Website Generator
item.description: Static Website Generator (SWG) A Static Website Generator (SWG) is an item that helps building websites with little or no changes over time - so static websites. Before the SWGs came up static websites were generated by backend HTML programming. A dynamic website needs a CMS to be operated. SWGs try to combine the advantages of backend programming and CMS: Content creation via simple markup (often Markdown), no need to dig into HTML Separation of content and style(s) Support for well structured (textual) content
